flawed_nl_solution:
He increases the length to 13+2=<<13+2=15>>15 feet
He increases the width to 18+2=<<18+2=20>>20 feet
So the rooms are 15*20=<<15*20=3000>>3000 square feet
So he has 1+3=<<1+3=4>>4 rooms of this size
So he has 4*3000=<<4*3000=12000>>12000 square feet of rooms this size
He also has one room of size 3000*2=<<3000*2=6000>>6000 square feet
So he has 12000+6000=<<12000+6000=18000>>18000 square feet of rooms
#### 18000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
